basics.name: Pau Torres
basics.label: Senior Front End Developer
basics.summary: I am a Senior Front End developer with 7+ years of experience in all stages of the web/app development lifecycle including requirements analysis, designs, development, verification, deployment and support. Experienced in dynamic responsive sites, hybrid mobile apps, and interactive features that drive business growth and improve UX. Motivated, resourceful and passionate about open source code, data visualization, blockchain ecosystems, and social/local economics.

highlights: Development of hybrid mobile apps with Ionic (2 & 3), Angular (version 2 & 5) and Typescript.
Data visualisation of realtime data with D3.
Development, troubleshooting and addressing browser compatibility issues for various responsives sites.
work.toolsandtech: Ionic 2, Angular 2, Typescript, Gulp, Sass, BEM, D3, Bootstrap Grid, jQuery, lodash, postal

highlights: Development and architecture of Veeva iRep apps for iPad and Windows 8 tablet for various clients. Also worked  on Veeva Approved Emails.
Created the 'Keymap Generator', a small Nodejs tool to convert JSON files into Excel documents used to create Key Messages Map for Veeva apps.
Development, troubleshooting and addressing browser compatibility issues for various responsives sites (ampyra.com, nesinafamily.com, entyvio.com, contrave.com).
Building and development of rich media html5 banners.
work.toolsandtech: html5, css3, javascript, jQuery, D3.js, Node.js, Grunt, Less, Express.js, Ruby, Bower, Hammer.js, Socket.IO,  Underscore.js. Bootstrap, Sass, compass, Google Web Designer API

Angular.js developer for Telus mobile app and Biogen website.

Front end developement and supervising for sonyrewards.com.

Created, supervised and responded to quality assurance department on the development of HTML Emails.

references.name: Drew Ashby (Technology Director, Klick Health) / dashby@klick.com
references.reference: In terms of performance, Pau is unparalleled.  His work is always of the highest quality and the successful outcome of any project is his pride and his priority.  His technical skills are very strong and diverse as demonstrated by his ability to succeed in a variety of digital technologies including websites (responsive, mobile or otherwise), development and consumption of web services, emails, ad units and a small host of proprietary technologies such as the Veeva platform that he learned and mastered.  Pau is a fluent communicator who is able to work with different teams from different backgrounds and disciplines easily.

references.name: Mark Donaldson (Sr. Web Developer, Klick Health) / mdonaldson@klick.com
references.reference: Pau was a valuable asset to Klick Health and rapidly gained a reputation as an individual who could quickly grasp new projects and new frameworks producing quality websites and other digital assets often quicker than was expected. Pau's organization skills combined with his ability to understand all aspects of the project at hand meant that during the production phase, multiple departments knew they could rely on his expertise and judgement. In that regard, Pau was a key to the success of the endeavor.

references.name: Simon Withers (Vice President, Technology, Klick Health) / swithers@klick.com
references.reference: Pau excels as both a member of a development team, and taking initiative himself, and has demonstrated both multiple times. He will do what is necessary to drive a project to completion, and is not afraid to identify areas where better process or improved or altered practice would better serve his colleagues, clients or employer.
